E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Rick Sutcliffe
Dear Sir,
Rick Sutcliffe has an ERA of 0.46 at A Spartanburg Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Gary Serum
Dear Sir,
Gary Serum is doing pretty good at A Spartanburg Phillies!
He has an ERA of 1.47, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
